title: When you are playing a support
body:
and you assist in every kill leading to the Penta-Kill
http://i.imgur.com/q19B9.gif

replies.body: Pentassists, atleast %35 as satisfying as a Pentakill
pentasteal, 100% more satisfying than pentakill when playing support with a shithead.

I was picked Braum support the other day

I ended as Braum ADC

{{champion:201}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3091}} {{item:1300}} {{item:3022}} Is there a problem here?
When you play support and shield your adc and then they get a penta kill with you doing nothing. Satisfying af.

http://i.imgur.com/gUH3MJD.gif
you have to click it it seems

{{champion:3}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:412}} "You're welcome bro, that could've been ~750 less gold for me."

{{champion:11}} **Penta Kill!!!**

{{champion:11}} "/all All me"

{{champion:117}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} (fuk this game)

-----

Srsly..this literally happened in one of my recent games. our Yi got 2 penta kills. i think he didn't acknowledge that i got the penta-assist because he was already on tilt because "his team is bad"..Q_Q.

When I'm playing League, I find nothing more satisfying than going into a 2v5 with someone and getting assists for a whole pentakill. Doesn't matter what role I am or what role they are, I find assisting it much more satisfying.

Because I've never gotten my own Penta.

It is more like this 
You go for the handshake and then this happens
http://rack.3.mshcdn.com/media/ZgkyMDEzLzA2LzEyLzM4L0FubmVIYXRod2F5LjI2ZWVmLmdpZgpwCXRodW1iCTEyMDB4OTYwMD4/435e0b31/4f7/Anne-Hathway.gif
